Description: Infinitely flexible. Incredibly easy to use. Great mobile apps. It's free. Trello keeps track of everything, from the big picture to the minute details.
Name: Trello

Methods.Name: Add Card
Methods.Description: Adds a new card.

Methods.Name: Get Board By Card ID
Methods.Description: Gets the board that this card is on.

Methods.Name: Update Card
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a card.

Methods.Name: List Updated Cards
Methods.Description: List the cards that have been updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List Modified Cards
Methods.Description: Get cards that have been edited.

Methods.Name: Get Card Detail
Methods.Description: Get full details of a card.

Methods.Name: Search Cards By Board
Methods.Description: This method will return a list of all cards in a board included in the search.

Methods.Name: Delete Card
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified card.

Methods.Name: Search Updated Cards
Methods.Description: Gets cards based on search period filter.

Methods.Name: List Cards for Board
Methods.Description: Gets the cards for the specified board.

Methods.Name: Update Board
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a board.

Methods.Name: Create Board
Methods.Description: Create a new board.

Methods.Name: List Open Boards
Methods.Description: List all boards with a status of "open".

Methods.Name: Get Board
Methods.Description: Get details of a single board.

Methods.Name: Add List to Board
Methods.Description: Adds a new list to a board.

Methods.Name: Delete Board
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified board.

Methods.Name: List New Boards
Methods.Description: List all boards created since last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Boards
Methods.Description: List all updates for the board whenever the board was created, updated or closed.

Methods.Name: Set Custom Field Value
Methods.Description: Set the value of a Custom Field on Card.

Methods.Name: Create Custom Field
Methods.Description: Creates a Custom Field on the specified Board.

Methods.Name: Update Custom Field
Methods.Description: Updates details of a custom field.

Methods.Name: Delete Custom Field
Methods.Description: Deletes a custom field from a board.

Methods.Name: Get Custom Field
Methods.Description: Gets details of a custom field.

Methods.Name: List Board Members
Methods.Description: Gets the members for a board.

Methods.Name: Add Card Member
Methods.Description: Adds a member to a card.

Methods.Name: List Organization Members
Methods.Description: List the members in a Workspace.

Methods.Name: List Card Members
Methods.Description: Gets a list of members for a card.

Methods.Name: Get Member
Methods.Description: Gets the details of a member.

Methods.Name: Board Changed
Methods.Description: Receives an action for when a board is updated. Use "Action Type And Translation Key" to filter the events you are interested in.

Methods.Name: List Changed
Methods.Description: Receives an action for when a List is updated. Use "Action Type And Translation Key" to filter the events you are interested in.

Methods.Name: Create List
Methods.Description: Creates a new list on a board.

Methods.Name: Get Board Lists
Methods.Description: Get the lists for the specified board.

Methods.Name: Get List Cards
Methods.Description: Gets all cards in a specified list.

Methods.Name: Update List
Methods.Description: Updates the properties of a list.

Methods.Name: Get List
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specifed list.

Methods.Name: Get Checklist Item
Methods.Description: Gets details of the specified checklist item.

Methods.Name: Update Card Checklist Item
Methods.Description: Updates a checklist item on a card.

Methods.Name: Get Card Checklists
Methods.Description: Gets the checklists for a card.

Methods.Name: Delete Card Checklist Item
Methods.Description: Deletes an item from a checklist attached to a card.

Methods.Name: Delete Card Checklist
Methods.Description: Deletes a card checklist.

Methods.Name: Add Card Checklist Item
Methods.Description: Adds an item to an existing checklist.

Methods.Name: Add Card Checklist
Methods.Description: This method adds a checklist to a card.

Methods.Name: List Card Attachments
Methods.Description: Gets the card Attachments.

Methods.Name: Add URL Attachment
Methods.Description: Adds an attachments to the card from a URL.

Methods.Name: Get Card Labels
Methods.Description: Get the labels for the specified card.

Methods.Name: Delete Label from Card
Methods.Description: Deletes a label from a card.

Methods.Name: Add Board Label
Methods.Description: Adds a label to a board.

Methods.Name: Add Label To Card
Methods.Description: Adds a label to a card.

Methods.Name: Delete Board Label
Methods.Description: Deletes a label from a board.

Methods.Name: Update Label Color
Methods.Description: Updates the color of a label.

Methods.Name: Get Board Labels
Methods.Description: Get the labels for the specified board.

Methods.Name: Add Card Comment
Methods.Description: Adds a comment to a card.

Methods.Name: Get Enterprise
Methods.Description: Get an enterprise by its ID.

Methods.Name: Update Team
Methods.Description: Updates the details of a team (aka organization).

Methods.Name: Get Team
Methods.Description: Gets the details of the specified team (aka organization).

Methods.Name: Add Team
Methods.Description: Adds a team (aka organization).

Methods.Name: Get Team Boards
Methods.Description: Gets the boards for the specified team (aka organization).

Methods.Name: Get Team Members
Methods.Description: Gets the members of a team (aka organization).

Methods.Name: Delete Team
Methods.Description: Deletes a team (aka organization).

Methods.Name: Get Card Action
Methods.Description: Get details of the specified action.

Methods.Name: List Card Actions
Methods.Description: Gets the actions associated with a card.

Methods.Name: Delete Card Action
Methods.Description: Deletes a card action.
